mapper.select: select order_id, customer_id, dot_id, sender_address_id, receive_address_id, res_sort_id, weight, insured_price, freight, remarks, order_time, state from speedlogisticsdb.t_order where order_id = #{id}

select order_id, customer_id, dot_id, sender_address_id, receive_address_id, res_sort_id, weight, insured_price, freight, remarks, order_time, state from speedlogisticsdb.t_order limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into speedlogisticsdb.t_order(customer_id, dot_id, sender_address_id, receive_address_id, res_sort_id, weight, insured_price, remarks, state) values (#{customerId}, #{dotId}, #{senderAddressId}, #{receiveAddressId}, #{resSortId}, #{weight}, #{insuredPrice}, #{remarks}, 0)
mapper.update:
update speedlogisticsdb.t_order
customer_id = #{customerId},
dot_id = #{dotId},
sender_address_id = #{senderAddressId},
receive_address_id = #{receiveAddressId},
res_sort_id = #{resSortId},
weight = #{weight},
insured_price = #{insuredPrice},
freight = #{freight},
remarks = #{remarks},
order_time = #{orderTime},

where order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.select: SELECT c.`wx_name`,c.`real_name`,d.`dot_name`, MAX(CASE a.`type` WHEN '0' THEN a.`owner_name` ELSE NULL END) sender_name, MAX(CASE a.`type` WHEN '0' THEN a.`phone` ELSE NULL END) sender_phone, MAX(CASE a.`type` WHEN '0' THEN CONCAT(a.`address_city`,a.`address`) ELSE NULL END) sender_address, MAX(CASE a.`type` WHEN '1' THEN a.`owner_name` ELSE NULL END) receive_name, MAX(CASE a.`type` WHEN '1' THEN a.`phone` ELSE NULL END) receive_phone, MAX(CASE a.`type` WHEN '1' THEN CONCAT(a.`address_city`,a.`address`) ELSE NULL END) receive_address, r.`res_sort`,o.`weight`,o.`insured_price`,o.`freight`,o.`remarks`,o.`order_time`,o.`state` FROM `t_order` o,`t_customer` c,`t_dot` d,`t_address` a,`t_res_sort` r WHERE o.`customer_id` = c.`customer_id` AND o.`dot_id` = d.`dot_id` AND o.`res_sort_id` = r.`res_sort_id` AND (o.`sender_address_id` = a.`address_id` OR o.`receive_address_id` = a.`address_id`) AND o.`order_id` = #{orderId} GROUP BY o.`order_id`
